title: If you're poor IRL it's not because you're a victim...
body:
it's because you make bad choices and are lazy.

This whole "victim" mentality is the same concept as elo hell. "i don't deserve to be here, bad things just keep happening to me! Only the lucky people are rich!!" 

Take some fucking responsibility, look at why you're poor/a failure. Ask what choices YOU made to get to this situation and make better ones in the future. Then you will become successful. 

If not you're just going to stay poor, just like kids stay bronze after 6,000 ranked games in a single season lolz.
